Question: This person received the AFI Life Achievement Award in 1996, and received an honorary degree from AFI in 2009.
Hints: This person next directed Changeling (2008), based on a true story set in the late 1920s.
Robert Lorenz, who worked with this person as an assistant director on several films, directed the film.
In 1990, this person began living with actress Frances Fisher, whom he had met on the set of Pink Cadillac in late 1988.
